column4: hey gys, do you know any link which would help me to setting up my send mail in ubuntu, I installed it through synaptic..
hey gys, do you know any link which would help me to setting up my send mail in ubuntu, I installed it through synaptic.
just start evolution & follow the wizard
no, you need something else for that, like sendmail or qmail, there are whole books detailing how to setup sendmail, that's not something you want to do over irc ;)
